subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ top prospect Ike Davis went 2 for 4 in his major league debut as the Mets scored five runs in the seventh to break a 1-1 tie and beat the Cubs.
snippet: The Mets’ top prospect Ike Davis went 2 for 4 in his major league debut as the Mets scored five runs in the seventh to break a 1-1 tie and beat the Cubs.
